subject: Golf
lead_paragraph: Considering how far behind Steve Stricker and Phil Mickelson are in The Tour Championship, Tiger Woods does not even have to win the tournament to claim the $10 million FedEx Cup prize.
snippet: Considering how far behind Steve Stricker and Phil Mickelson are in The Tour Championship, Tiger Woods does not even have to win the tournament to claim the $10 million FedEx Cup prize.
